title: Analyst sentiments toward Entegris Inc stock

content.text: Most analysts have a positive outlook on Entegris Inc stock. Out of 10 analysts surveyed, 7 recommend buying the stock, 2 recommend holding, and only 1 recommends selling.
Price targets for Entegris Inc stock vary among analysts, but the majority of targets indicate potential upside. The range of price targets is between $100 and $150 per share.

Analysts are optimistic about Entegris Inc's prospects due to its strong market position and potential for growth in the semiconductor industry. The company's solid financial performance and strategic acquisitions have also been praised by analysts.

news.headline: Entegris Releases Latest Corporate Social Responsibility Report Highlighting Progress Toward 2030 Goals
news.summary: BILLERICA, Mass., July 09, 2024--Entegris (Nasdaq: ENTG), a leading supplier of advanced materials and process solutions for the semiconductor and other high-technology industries, today issued its fourth annual Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) report. The 2023 Corporate Social Responsibility Report is available online and provides a comprehensive overview of Entegris’ continued efforts to advance the company’s CSR strategy across its four key pillars: Innovation, Safety, Personal Developme
